page.title: 10Traditional games (3)
page.content: {Wink Murder.}The children stand in a circle.One person is secretly picked to be the murderer without the others knowing.If you are winked at then you lie down as if dead.The person who finds out who the murderer is without being killed herself is the winner. {Ladders.}Two people sit facing each other with their legs in front of them and in a line of other pairs.Each pair is numbered and when the number is called out the pair must run up the line jumping over the legs and then run back to their place.The first of the pair back wins a point. {Whirly.}Players stand in a circle and are numbered 1,2,3,4 or 5.When a number is called those with that number must go round twice trying to touch the other runners before returning to their place.When touched, the player must sit down.
